text: are you bored of the same old chicken

it to a simmer and cook for about five
minutes before you add your chicken
after your aromatics have simmered for
about five minutes add your chicken it's
about 1 pound of boneless skinless

until just put through at a very low
simmer that should take about 15 minutes
when your chicken is completely cool cut
it up into bite-size pieces or smaller
whatever size you like for chicken salad
you can tear it as well if that's your

is also going to have a little bit of

it's not completely important though the
